Text: Looks like you and I are about the only ones left still using torrents here. Need more info in magnet links than just the name of the file. It would also be great not to have to wait till it is downloading and then go back and make any changes that you desire. If by chance your computer would crash or the torrent client client would crash, how are you going to restore what you were downloading without the torrent stored on a hard drive?
Yes, is true, thetorrentlord! This magnet thing is annoying
